bibl.title: Philo and the Jews in Alexandria.

bibl.seg: BORGEN Peder, Philo and the Jews in Alexandria.
Per BILDE et alii (Edd.), Ethnicity in Hellenistic Egypt = Studies in Hellenistic Civilization. III (Aarhus, 1992) pp. 122-138.
